name: Xumite
strategy_rules:
select(P, O, S, M):-
    \+ holds(last_move(O, _LMo), S),
    holds(default_move(P, M), S).
select(_P, O, S, Mo):-
    holds(last_move(O, Mo), S).
game_rules:
:- discontiguous effect/3.
:- discontiguous abnormal/3.
:- discontiguous initially/2.

/* Game specific predicates for Employee Sharing Game */

% Payoff matrix (share = 'S', withhold = 'W')
payoff('S', 'S', 4, 4).
payoff('S', 'W', 1, 5).
payoff('W', 'S', 5, 1).
payoff('W', 'W', 2, 2).

% Initial state
initial(s0).

% What holds initially
initially(player(emp1), s0).
initially(player(emp2), s0).
initially(role(emp1,row), s0).
initially(role(emp2,col), s0).
initially(control(emp1), s0).
initially(control(emp2), s0).
initially(default_move(_, 'S'), s0).

% When a state is final
final(do(move(_P2, _M2), do(move(_P1, _M1), S))):-initial(S).

% Legal moves
legal(move(P, M), S):- possible(move(P, M), S), holds(control(P), S).

% Possible moves
possible(move(P,'S'), S):- holds(player(P), S).
possible(move(P,'W'), S):- holds(player(P), S).

% Opposite moves
opposite_move('S', 'W').
opposite_move('W', 'S').

% Effects of moves
effect(did(P, M), move(P, M), _S).
abnormal(control(P), move(P, _M), _S).

% What holds finally
finally(outcome(P1,M1,U1,P2,M2,U2), S):-
    final(S),
    holds(role(P1, row), S),
    holds(did(P1, M1), S),
    holds(role(P2, col), S),
    holds(did(P2, M2), S),
    payoff(M1, M2, U1, U2).

finally(goal(P1, U1), S):-
    finally(outcome(P1,_,U1,_,_,_), S).
finally(goal(P2, U2), S):-
    finally(outcome(_,_,_,P2,_,U2), S).
